mapper.select: select BRD.*,DIM.ID_DIM,DIM.NAME_DIM,USR.ID_USR,USR.NAME_USR,TEM.ID_TEM,TEM.NAME_TEM,CCM.ID_CCM,CCM.NAME_CCM from BRAND_MASTER_BRD BRD JOIN DIVISION_BRAND_DBR DBR ON DBR.ID_BRD_DBR = BRD.ID_BRD JOIN DIVISION_MASTER_DIM DIM ON DIM.ID_DIM = DBR.ID_DIM_DBR JOIN BRANDMANAGER_BRAND_BBR BBR ON BBR.ID_BRD_BBR = BRD.ID_BRD JOIN USER_MASTER_USR USR ON USR.ID_USR = BBR.ID_USR_BBR JOIN TEAM_BRAND_TBR TBR ON TBR.ID_BRD_TBR = BRD.ID_BRD JOIN TEAM_MASTER_TEM TEM ON TEM.ID_TEM = TBR.ID_TEM_TBR JOIN COSTCENTER_BRAND_CBR CBR ON CBR.ID_BRD_CBR = BRD.ID_BRD JOIN COST_CENTER_MASTER_CCM CCM ON CCM.ID_CCM = CBR.ID_CCM_CBR WHERE BRD.ID_BRD = #{id}
mapper.update: update BRAND_MASTER_BRD set NAME_BRD = #{name} , CI_NAME_BRD = #{ciName} ,IS_ACTIVE_BRD = #{active} , UPDATED_BY_BRD = #{updatedBy}, UPDATED_ON_BRD = GETDATE() where ID_BRD = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into BRAND_MASTER_BRD (ID_BRD,NAME_BRD,CI_NAME_BRD,CODE_BRD,IS_ACTIVE_BRD,CREATED_ON_BRD,CREATED_BY_BRD,UPDATED_ON_BRD,UPDATED_BY_BRD) values( #{id}, #{name}, #{ciName}, #{code}, #{active}, GETDATE(), #{createdBy}, GETDATE(), #{updatedBy} )
